description_for_human: Find market, competitor, customer, and government data using free public sources.
description_for_model: Helps U.S. small business owners by searching free public databases for companies, market trends, local competitors, industry data, customer demographics, grants, website technology stacks, and ad transparency.

actions.name: search_companies
actions.description: Search for companies in OpenCorporates database.

actions.name: get_market_trends
actions.description: Retrieve Google Trends data via PyTrends proxy.

actions.name: get_local_competitors
actions.description: Find local competitors using Yelp data.

actions.name: get_industry_data
actions.description: Retrieve industry statistics from NAICS / Census API.

actions.name: get_grants
actions.description: Search for grants using Grants.gov API.

actions.name: get_website_stack
actions.description: Fetch technology stack information from BuiltWith (manual link).

actions.name: get_ad_transparency
actions.description: Search Meta Ad Library for transparency information (manual link).
